changes.removed: If .msf file for parent IMAP folder is suffixed(X-1.msf, X-2.msf etc.), search folder is created in wrong .sbd directory without suffix(x.sbd)
changes.added: If .msf file for parent IMAP folder is suffixed(X-1.msf, X-2.msf etc. for folder of X) , .msf file for search folder is created under wrong .sbd directory without suffix(x.sbd instead of correct X-n.sbd even though X-suffix.msf is used for IMAP folder X)

If .msf file for parent IMAP folder is suffixed(X-suffix.msf for folder of X) .msf file for search folder is created under wrong .sbd directory without suffix(under x.sbd instead of proper X-suffix.sbd) even though X-suffix.msf is used for IMAP folder X)
changes.removed: If .msf file for parent IMAP folder is suffixed(X-1.msf, X-2.msf etc. for folder of X) , .msf file for search folder is created under wrong .sbd directory without suffix(x.sbd instead of correct X-n.sbd even though X-suffix.msf is used for IMAP folder X)
